petsitter.bio: I have always had pets in my life and treated them all like family. I have had cats, dogs, rats, mice, rabbits; and look forward to adding to that list!
petsitter.name: Georgia Williams
petsitter.services: Pet boarding, Dog walking, Pet Stay, Dog Groaming

petsitter.description: Love animals and taking care of them
petsitter.bio: My service centers around, walking, feeding and caring for dogs. From puppies to seniors, I can care for your dog(s) like my family pet. Service provided in your home. Would love to discuss your pet care needs. References available. Love all dogs ! Reasonable rates.
petsitter.name: Olga Kostopoulos

petsitter.bio: Hi there my name is John. I'm seeking a dog sitter work opportunity in York, Pennsylvania. I'm hoping to utilize my experience as a dog sitter. I will work part
petsitter.name: John Humman
petsitter.services: Pet boarding, Dog walking, Pet Stay, Dog Groaming

petsitter.description: Let me love on your PET just like I would love mine
petsitter.bio: Nice to meet you! My name is Amber. I am an Athens based pet sitter, that will travel to you and help take care of your fur family when you are away. I offer all animal care, dog/cat walking, potty break visits, check in visits, overnight care and more.
petsitter.name: Amber Kollidas

petsitter.description: If you look for quality service, search no more
petsitter.bio: Nice to meet you! My name is Lucy. In need of a in- home pet sitter? No need to worry my goal is to reduce separation anxiety by staying in your home while u are away .
petsitter.name: Kostas Samaris
petsitter.services: Pet boarding, Dog walking, Pet Stay, Dog Groaming

petsitter.description: Impatient to work with you and love your pet like you would
petsitter.bio: I am recently retired from 40 years of working as business owner and since my retirement I have been travelling the world house and pet sitting.
petsitter.name: Lori Katzaki
petsitter.services: Pet boarding, Dog walking, Pet Stay, Dog Groaming

petsitter.description: For premium services, you are looking at the right profile
petsitter.bio: I am happy to help with cat feeding, providing play time, and overnight boarding. Further, I am willing to travel. I have over a year of experience.
petsitter.name: Alex Papadopoulos
